body.name: Dash Cam, Dash Camera for Cars 1080P, Dual Dash Cam Front and Inside, Infrared Night Vision Car Camera, Dashcam with 32GB SD Card, Loop Recording, G-Sensor, Parking Monitor, Car Cam for Taxi Uber
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 4 mins
features: 【Dash Cam Front and Inside】The dash cam simultaneously captures video from the front and cabin of your car as vital evidence for accident or dispute. The dash camera with 1080P FHD is used at the front, which has stunning starlight night vision with a 170 degree wide angle of view. The car camera performs well in color precision and clarity, and no blind spot in the recording.

【Super Night Vision & IR Cabin Light】The interior facing camera utilizing IR LED lights and f/2.0 aperture, which ensures sharp details of driver and passengers are captured whether day or night, even when the cabin is completely dark. It is a good ideal for rideshare drivers such as Uber, Lyft, and Taxi.

【32GB SD Card Included】Car dash cam with 32GB Micro SD card - You do not need to spend additional money buying SD cards. The own card avoids the compatibility problem. Nnote: Please format according to the product prompts for the first time.
【3-inch IPS Screen】The 3-inch IPS screen provides you with real-time video feedback in front of and inside your car.

【Loop Recording and G-Sensor】This dash camera adopt intelligent loop recording mode, when the SD card is full, it will auto free memory to ensure there is no missing recording at all times. Built-in gravity sensor will lock and protect accident video.

【24 Hours Parking Guard】To achieve this function, an extra car accessory- Mini USB hardwire kit is required (ASIN: B07FXJD8W1, not include in the package). Parking wake-up can be triggered by impact or movement, if your vehicle is involved in a hit while parked, or someone attempts to steal your vehicle, this dash cam will provide around-the-clock protection.

【One-Year Warranty Service】We provide each customer with a one-year warranty, 7*24 technical support, and response within 12 hours. You can send us an email through Amazon's email system, and we will quickly answer and solve the problems. If you still have any doubts, we will refund it in full within 30 days.
body.description: How to download the videos to view? Pleas use a mini USB connect the dash cam to computer, then you can view and download the video.Or you can remove the SD card from the dash cam and use a SD card read to replay and download the video to your computer. NOTE: During the day, the interior camera records color images. When the light inside the car dims or at night, the car camera activates the infrared LED light and records a black and white image. One-Year Service: If you have any doubts, you can send us an email through Amazon's email system, and we will quickly answer and solve the problems.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Great Value for Money It is a well-rounded unit that is a great choice for anyone looking to document and archive traffic collisions. You'll have its comprehensive features.1080P dual dash cam perfect for taxi/uber/rideshareSUV/RV/Jeep/truck/Lyft drivers, who need to record both scenery and happy time with your families on a road trip.

Quick Start Guide Always connect to power When daily recording, the dash cam requires a constant power supply, so the camera should be always plugged into the car's cigarette lighter. REMINDER: Please use the provided charger to ensure enough power. Format memory card When using it for the first time, it is necessary to format the memory card on the camera. Select "Format" in the menu and select"Format the TF card". If your dash cam stops recording and powers off while driving. Please kindly check if there are too many locked videos that can't be overwritten and filled up the SD card, to ensure normal storage, it is recommended to format the memory card once a month. 24 Hours Parking Guard If you need to use this feature, an extra car accessory- Mini USB hardwire kit is required (ASIN: B07FXJD8W1, not include in the package). Installing and pasting bracket Firstly, put the bracket into the slot of the dash cam and push it to the right to fix it. Then clean and dry the windshield, remove the red protective film of the double-sided adhesive. Next, stick it onto the windshield and twist the bracket to lock it. Please feel free to con-tact us if any professional help in need.

What's in the box 1x Main camera1x Interior camera1x Vehicle power cord1x Adhesive mount1x 32G-SD card (installed)User manual Warm Tips: NO wireless, NO APP, NO WIFI, NO GPS, NO Bluetooth. How to download the videos to view? Pleas use a mini USB connect the dash cam to computer, then you can view and download the video.Or you can remove the SD card from the dash cam and use a SD card read to replay and download the video to your computer. NOTE: During the day, the interior camera records color images. When the light inside the car dims or at night, the car camera activates the infrared LED light and records a black and white image. One-Year Service: If you have any doubts, you can send us an email through Amazon's email system, and we will quickly answer and solve the problems.

Super Night Vision & IR Cabin Light The interior facing camera utilizing IR LED lights and f/2.0 aperture, which ensures sharp details of driver and passengers are captured whether day or night. 32GB SD Card Included The dash cam with 32GB Micro SD card -You do not need to spend additional money buying SD cards. Note: Please format according to the product prompts for the first time. 24 Hours Parking Guard If you need to use this feature, an extra car accessory- Mini USB hardwire kit is required (ASIN: B07FXJD8W1, not include in the package).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for my truck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Nice features but does not work.
reviews.reviewText: This is the first dashcam I have tried and was excited to see how well it worked. Unfortunately after installing in my vehicle, I immediately got an SD card error message. I attempted removing, inspecting and reinstalling it but this was unsuccessful, so I purchased a comparable better quality card thinking this would fix the issue but it did not, I get the same error message. Aside from it not working, I wasn't crazy about the mounting option as you only get an adhesive backed clip that you slide the camera into. I would also like to see it have the option to hard wire it rather than use the 12v plug. I found the rear facing camera wire fitment to not be the best and adds an unattractive look. I like the screen and found toggling the options to be ok but not the best. I like the option to have a sensor that would record when the car is parked but that requires an add on. I don't like giving bad reviews but I cans only share what I experienced. I would spend the extra money for a better camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive option for recording traffic
reviews.reviewText: Works well for its intended purpose. I got this because I drive in a busy city and didn't want anyone taking advantage of my good nature (and excellent driving!) It helps to have a second set of eyes when things go down. This camera works fine for that task.
